name: Vermont Professionals of Color Network (VT PoC Network)
category: Black-owned Training program development in Vermont
description: This network provides business coaching, training, networking, and career support for Black, Indigenous, and People of Color (BIPOC) business owners and workers in Vermont. They partner with the Agency of Commerce and Community Development to offer these services at no cost
services: Black-owned Training program development in Vermont consultation

name: BIPOC Business and Career Assistance Program
category: Black-owned Training program development in Vermont
description: Administered by the Vermont Agency of Commerce and Community Development, this program offers business coaching and training to BIPOC business owners. It is delivered through the Vermont Professionals of Color Network
services: Black-owned Training program development in Vermont consultation

name: Vermont Small Business Development Center (VtSBDC)
address: Multiple locations across Vermont, including 1590 Route 7 South, Suite 8, Middlebury, VT 05753
category: Black-owned Training program development in Vermont
description: VtSBDC offers no-fee, confidential advising and low-cost training services to all small businesses in Vermont. While not exclusively for Black-owned businesses, they provide valuable resources for business development
services: Black-owned Training program development in Vermont consultation

name: Vermont Training Program (VTP)
category: Black-owned Training program development in Vermont
description: The VTP partners with employers and training providers to fund workforce development. Grants are available for pre-employment training, new hires, and incumbent worker training, open to all sectors of the Vermont economy
services: Black-owned Training program development in Vermont consultation

name: Business Training Works, Inc.
category: Black-owned Training program development in Vermont
description: This company offers tailored onsite training courses and workshops in Vermont across various industries, focusing on leadership, communication, and management skills
services: Black-owned Training program development in Vermont consultation

name: Mercy Connections
category: Black-owned Training program development in Vermont
description: Mercy Connections offers an inclusive entrepreneurship program with workshops, classes, and a business planning course for women and individuals with marginalized gender identities
services: Black-owned Training program development in Vermont consultation

name: LaunchVT
category: Black-owned Training program development in Vermont
description: LaunchVT provides business acceleration for Vermont startups, including focused trainings, pitch prep workshops, and peer strategy sessions
services: Black-owned Training program development in Vermont consultation

name: Vermont State University - Division of Professional Development & Continuing Education (DPDCE)
category: Black-owned Training program development in Vermont
description: DPDCE offers workforce training, professional learning opportunities for educators, and innovative workplace opportunities, including employer-supported cohorts and registered apprenticeship programs
services: Black-owned Training program development in Vermont consultation

name: Vermont Adult Learning (VAL)
category: Black-owned Training program development in Vermont
description: VAL provides free educational services, including workforce development initiatives, to Vermonters, focusing on enhancing job prospects and earning industry-recognized credentials
services: Black-owned Training program development in Vermont consultation

name: Rise Consulting, LLC
category: Black-owned Training program development in Vermont
description: Rise Consulting offers racial equity-centered services, including the design and delivery of training programs aimed at addressing structural racism and creating racial equity outcomes. They partner with organizations motivated to eliminate racial inequities
services: Black-owned Training program development in Vermont consultation
